FuncDef: Configure the minimum required age of a password before it can be changed again.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the minimum required days of a password before it can be changed again. Values-0 to 1.
Specifies the minimum required hours of a password before it can be changed again. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the minimum required minutes of a password before it can be changed again. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the minimum required seconds of a password before it can be changed again. Values-0 to 59.
